data.name: Hidden Memory - Neko's Life - Wallpapers
data.detailed_description:
Incredible arts specially designed to convey the atmosphere and moments of our kitten's life, leaving the desktop of your computer with a unique look!

There are 6 images with 3840 x 2160 pixels and Ultra Wide (2560 x 1080 pixels).

* Important: After downloading this add-on will be available in the directory where the game “Hidden Memory - Neko's Life” is installed, by default, it is (...\Steam\steamapps\common\ Hidden Memory - Neko's Life\ Hidden_Memory_Nekos_Life - Wallpapers).
